com.drfl.twinstickshooter.view

Class TSSMainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.drfl.twinstickshooter.view.TSSMainMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class TSSMainMenu
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    Main menu screen, options for starting game, seeing highscores, controlling volume, choosing input method and exiting game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TSSMainMenu(TSSGame game)
      Constructs a main menu screen belonging to a certain game.
